name: Brick Battle
overview: Brick Battle is a Breakout clone with three different modes of play. - Mode one is Single Buster, which is your standard Breakout. - Mode two is Double Buster in which the bricks are both on the top and bottom of the screen, however, you can still lose lives if you don't hit a brick within a certain period of time in this mode - Mode Three is Diamond Buster in which there are bricks in all four corners of the screen. You can also lose lives in this mode if you don't hit a brick within a certain time period as well. This game was released by Street Games as part of their "C64/128 Battle Pack" compilation.
